channel.title: CD reader/burner
channel.description: Alright well i need to install a game that is 2 disks onto my computer. The problem is my CD drive wont read any of the cds i used with it. I transfered the cd's onto a flashdrive but i dont know how to get it so i can use the second disk that is on my flashdrive. So does anyone have any solutions?
